[`func addAcceptableTypeIdentifiers([String])`](/documentation/uikit/uipasteconfiguration/addacceptabletypeidentifiers(_:))Adds an array of UTI strings to a paste configuration, increasing the variety of types the paste configuration accepts.[`func addTypeIdentifiers(forAccepting: any NSItemProviderReading.Type)`](/documentation/uikit/uipasteconfiguration/addtypeidentifiers(foraccepting:)-4fvd6)Expands the array of accepted UTIs for a paste configuration, based on those declared as supported by a specified class.
